credit_line: Gift of Richard C. Greenleaf Esq. in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
style: early 17th c needle lace and style
title: Band
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: a/b: grid of withdrawn element with needle lace, reticella style;  c: needle lace, punto in aria style or early 17th c. style
description: 1950-121-27-a/b is a small oblong panel of needle lace (reticella). Designs arranged in squares in three rows depicting people, boats, etc. Probably Biblical and contains one episode of Judith and Holofernes. 1950-121-27-c is a punto in aria trim.
name: Band
